topic: Terence Crawford's historic victory over Canelo Álvarez to become undisputed super-middleweight champion.
evaluation: This cluster presents a robust and comprehensive narrative surrounding the Terence Crawford vs. Canelo Álvarez boxing match. The articles cover the entire timeline of the event, starting with pre-fight profiles and build-up, including weigh-ins and expert predictions, moving through live reporting and the official fight outcome, and concluding with post-fight analysis, fighter reactions, and broader business implications. All articles are strictly relevant to the main topic, showing clear developmental potential and a logical flow of information. No articles were deemed noise as each contributes significantly to the overall story.
